# DocSearch Crawler Hands-on (Docusaurus)

## Goals
- Compare minimal / advanced / i18n / ranking / hierarchy templates
- Pick and merge the parts that fit your docs

## Templates in this repo
- docusaurus-docsearch-crawler-config-minimal
- docusaurus-docsearch-crawler-config-advanced
- docusaurus-docsearch-crawler-config-i18n
- docusaurus-docsearch-ranking-weights-minimal
- docusaurus-docsearch-hierarchy-optimized

## Exercise
1) Start from the minimal config, verify indexing
2) Add `searchableAttributes` / `customRanking` from the ranking template
3) Adjust selectors to match your theme (hierarchy template)
4) For multi-locale, adopt i18n template `start_urls` and `tags`
5) Exclude noisy routes via `stop_urls` (advanced template)

## Submission
- Replace placeholders (site/index name)
- Submit to DocSearch program or run private crawler

## Tips
- Keep hierarchy ordered in `searchableAttributes`
- Prefer sitemap-based discovery, add rateLimit if needed
- Test search UX with keyboard/voice readers
